#summary The irrelevant attribute specifies that an element is no longer (or not yet) relevant.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [DivElement <div> element] > *irrelevant attribute*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `true`
  * `false`

== Elements ==

You can use the `irrelevant` attribute on any element.
